description: This is useful for when services are not immediately available after their init scripts return - which is true of certain Java application servers. It is also useful when starting guests with the M(virt) module and needing to pause until they are ready.
author: Jeroen Hoekx
short_description: Waits for a given port to become accessible on a server.

description: number of seconds to wait before starting to poll
hostname or IP address to wait for
maximum number of seconds to wait for
either C(started), or C(stopped) depending on whether the module should poll for the port being open or closed.
